column4: can anyone offer me some help , on how to run a .tar file in terminal
tar: file.tar: Cannot open: No such file or directory
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
no it is a bittorrent client and they change the name from before
that link is the addres of the file on  your own computer
why not install it from the repo?
true it is ver 3.1, theres 4.2 on the site
i know, the jaunty repo hasnt been updated with it yet (karmic has it)
you can add that repo and get 4.2 for jaunty
add this line: deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/josh-noisymime/ppa/ubuntu jaunty main
